name: Mobius (for Go)
summary: This is a VR remount of a video installation of a film projected on four screens, remastered for VR.  Mobius depicts a man trapped in a never-ending loop. The is shown on four screens arranged in a cube. The audience, watches from within, as the looping film unfolds. Each screen’s playback is delayed by 25% as the one next to it. The story temporally interacts with itself screen to screen.
